item.description:
Raw Food Meetup event

This event will be held at The Organic Garden: http://organicgardenc... at 294 Cabot Street, Beverly, MA. Phone is 978-922-0004.

Host will be Mara, Daryl Elliott or the owner of The Organic Garden, Rawbert Reid or a combination.

There is a park on the ocean that we could visit afterwards if the weather is nice. Percy F. Lyons Park is only 6 blocks down Dane St. at the intersection of Dane St. and Lothrup St. To find it on a map, visit http://maps.google.co... and enter Percy F. Lyons Park, Beverly, MA or 111 Lothrup St., Beverly, MA.

No cost for the event beyond the cost for your food. Please request individual food tickets.
item.name: Organic Garden Cafe February Meetup
